summary: Increases the scale of blood spurts to create a more gruesome combat.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=aqua]IMPORTANT NOTE - IF UPGRADING from the Steam Workshop version of this mod please
disable/remove the Steam Workshop version of this mod first.[/color][/b]


In this mod I simply increased the scale of blood spurts to create a more gruesome bloody combat feeling.
It is compatible with all enhanced blood texture mods.

The screenshots I took was with the Full Strength 100% mod so if you want less/more than that download one of the other strength versions you prefer - 50%, 75%, 100%, or 150%.

Enjoy.  Please endorse.

[b]Instructions:
1. Extract archive to your Skyrim Data folder (usually something like C:\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)[/b]

All the files should end up here ....\\skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Effects\\impacteffects\\

2. Play Game!


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=yellow]FOLLOWING IS FOR ADVANCED USERS ONLY[/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Further blood and gore manipulation....

If you want, you can further enhance blood effects by changing the following variables in your Skyrim INI (config) file for more blood realism/unrealism...

[Display]
......
fDecapitateBloodTime=20
fWeaponBloodLifetime=20
iBloodSplatterMaxCount=30
iDismemberBloodDecalCount=30
fDecalLifetime=999.0000
iMaxDecalsPerFrame=999


On a side note - here are some more variables but they don\'t seem to make a difference IMHO....

fMinBloodDamage=0.5000
bUseThreadedBlood=1
bDecalsOnSkinnedGeometry=1
iMaxSkinDecalsPerFrame=25
fBloodSplatterCountBase=4
fBloodSplatterCountDamageBase=0
fBloodSplatterCountDamageMult=0.9000
fBloodSplatterCountRandomMargin=1
fBloodSplatterDuration=10
fBloodSplatterFadeStart=0.8
fBloodSplatterFlareMult=2
fBloodSplatterFlareOffsetScale=0.900
fBloodSplatterFlareSize=0.2
fBloodSplatterMaxOpacity=2
fBloodSplatterMaxOpacity2=2
fBloodSplatterMaxSize=0.500
fBloodSplatterMinOpacity=2
fBloodSplatterMinOpacity2=2
fBloodSplatterMinSize=0.400
fBloodSplatterOpacityChance=1
fCombatEnvironmentBloodChance=2
author: Dan Caldwell
